item.title: TRB 2024: Innovative Approaches to Traffic Law Enforcement
item.description: This lectern session was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Traffic Law Enforcement (ACS30). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-24-01040.

item.title: TRB 2024: Transportation Safety Management Systems from Start to Finish
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Transportation Safety Management Systems (ACS10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-24-00048.

item.title: TRB 2023: Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations 2023
item.description: This lectern session was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-23-00705.

item.title: TRB 2022: Advancing Safety Through Traffic Law Enforcement
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Traffic Law Enforcement (ACS30). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-22-01574. It was later published in Transportation Research Record and is available here.

item.title: TRB 2022: Freeway and Regional Transportation Systems and Operations 2022
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Freeway Operations (ACP20) and Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-22-01598. It was later published in Transportation Research Record and is available here. Note that although I was not the lead author, I presented the poster due to the main author being unable to attend.

item.title: TRB 2021: Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations 2021
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-21-00078. It was later published in Advances in Transportation Studies and is available here.
